column4: Hello everyone, i'm having problems with my marvell atheros card.  ndiswrapper tells me all the drivers are invalid i can't get it to work
Hello everyone, i'm having problems with my marvell atheros card.  ndiswrapper tells me all the drivers are invalid i can't get it to work
i wasn't sure if you got that the first time
it appears to be supported out of the box on gutsy
: what does that mean , basically it should work ?
: i've grabbed the .inf file from vistas side and it only tells me invalid
: what do i use the .sys file for? or where do i put it ...
: shouldsn't the vista drivers work? it still didn't work with ndiswrapper
it may be possible that they implement some feature of NDIS in Vista that is not presently implemented in ndiswrapper???
can you try the XP driver instead?
